name: M-Carrom
description:
Carrom is a board game similar to Pool, Billards or Snooker. There are 19 discs (counters) and these must be hit using the Striker Disc, into the 4 pockets on the corners of the board.

***** A big thanks to our customers for their feedback over the years. *****

Based on your inputs, we have revamped the game into a new avatar as follows:

- A new and simplified touch interface! Place two fingers anywhere on the screen and move them left and right to position the striker before launch. Swipe anywhere on the screen, using a single finger, to launch the striker.

- To launch the striker, you can swipe anywhere on the screen. It is not necessary to swipe over the striker. This makes it far easier on devices with smaller screen sizes.

- A brand new Target Mode with 15 levels to test your skill

- Unlock new Achievements on Game Center as you play each game mode

- A new step by step, guided Tutorial section to help you grasp the new interface

- New graphics and Physics Engine for an improved game play experience

- A separate AI Mode with 3 improved AI opponents to play against
